channel.title: Models? have a few questions
channel.description: Is it possible to like load a tenticle whip (not like a custom) ? <---- i dunno if this is possible.... also how can i make it poison??? How can i make it use the kraken tenticle + whip to create the tenticle whip (with charges that actually decrease)? Last question is... how can i add animations with bosses?? (the ones i have are gzipped)

item.title: Models? have a few questions
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, yes, it is possible to load items to your client.
Technically, if the item was not already in your revision’s cache, it is a custom (just saying).
I released the whip you want here if you haven’t already gotten it.
Adding anims for NPCs is tricky. You may want to look up a tutorial on it, if any…

I can’t really help you much more until you post more information about what you’re using…

Everything you’re asking is possible.

Read full topic
